SEARCH
Package cams.model.camp

Class Camp

java.lang.Object
cams.model.camp.Camp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Displayable, DisplayableHeader, Model, Savable
public class Camp extends Object implements Model, DisplayableHeader
This class represents a camp. It contains information such as the camp name, start and end dates, registration close date, group who can sign up, location, total slots, committee slots, description staff, and the list of attendees, leavers and camp committee members.

    • Camp

      public Camp(String campID, String campName, Date startDate, Date endDate, Date regCloseDate, eFaculty userGroup, eLocation campLocation, int campTotalSlots, int campCommitteeSlots, String campDescription, String staffInCharge, ArrayList<String> listOfAttendees, ArrayList<String> listOfCampCommittees, ArrayList<String> leavers, boolean visibility)
      Default constructor.
      Parameters:
      campID - Id of the camp.
      campName - Name of the camp.
      startDate - Start date of the camp.
      endDate - End date of the camp.
      regCloseDate - Registration close date for the camp.
      userGroup - Faculty associated with the camp.
      campLocation - Location of the camp.
      campTotalSlots - Total available slots for attendees.
      campCommitteeSlots - Total available slots for camp committee members.
      campDescription - Description of the camp.
      staffInCharge - Staff member in charge of the camp.
      listOfAttendees - List of attendees user IDs.
      listOfCampCommittees - List of camp committee members' user IDs.
      leavers - List of user IDs of leavers of a camp.
      visibility - Visibility status of the camp.

      public Boolean isClash(Date start, Date end)
      Checks if there is a schedule clash for the camp and another camp the user has already registered for.
      Parameters:

      end - The end date to check for clashes.
      Returns:
      True if there is a clash, false otherwise.
